title: Celebrations: achievement

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Achievement behavior in children
description: Episode of Series "For the juniors". A short program aimed at children aged 4-8 narrated by Carolyn Jones showing the different ways that people celebrate achieving certain goals. Following a group of year 7 students to their graduation from school, comparing their preparation and celebration to a group of Police Force cadets preparing to graduate from the Academy. Also discussed is the importance of acknowledging all achievements, no matter how small they may seem.
